text: V de V is an abbreviation that can stand for: * Eric van de Vyver, a French business entrepreneur and motor racing driver * Vêtements de Vacance, a sportswear fashion brand established by Michèle Rosier * Violadores del Verso, a group Spanish rap music performers * V de V Sports, a French-based motor racing organisation and racing team owned by Eric Van de Vyver.
title: V de V
